Posts.Title: first appointment

Posts.Content: Hiya. When i went to castle hill for my fisrt appointment the dr examined me then sent me for a mammogram and also a scan. They also did a biopsy on the lump too. I then had to see the Dr again and he said my lump was suspicous but would have to wait for results.........mine took 10days. What Dr are you under as mine is Glover and he is lovely, xx
Posts.Title: first appointment

Posts.Content: Hiya Shawshank. Been thinking about you today. How did you get on and hope they looked after you. Add me as a friend if you ever want to chat. Take care Lisa xx

Posts.Title: facebook

Posts.Content: Hiya, I had my diep delayed reconstruction on the 3rd of march this year. I'm so pleased i have had it done. Pain wise it's all controlled. I've been told to stay off work for between 8-12 weeks depending how I feel. It's hard not been able to do the things your use to and you will need lots of help for the first few weeks. My stomach scar is really tidy and is healing lovely :-) it's so nice to wear a bra without a prosthesis too. Any questions I can help with please feel free to ask x
Posts.Title: DIEP recon ladies
